author: ShadowWolfHount
title: More teachers for the wizardry world
review:
A nice pack to get teachers from Harry Potter, even thought one of them been hit with a rediculus spell.

Getting Horace as a minifigure for the first time and Dolores the second time with a big improvement from that last one back in 2007.

Madame look like they added a bit so not to look like the exact same from the 2010 version; thought the problem I have with this figure is that she doesn't have her golden eye on one side, but the the side with the goggles on has them. It's pretty disappointing that she doesn't have the same color eyes on both side.

I love the use of that fur collar piece on Snape for the cat instead of not having it and looking strange.

Besides for that disappointment with the eye on Madame; these figures are perfect for the Harry Potter collection and a classroom display.

author: rldissell
title: Barnes & Noble promotional HP minifigures
review:
I love this set of minifigures! The only thing I was disappointed about was that Snape didn't come with a wand even though each of the rest of the minifigs came with wands. Snape is definitely my favorite of the bunch, just because of the hilarious outfit.

I have the entire set of HP/FP series 1 collectible minifigures, plus all of the 2018 HP & FB lego sets. This promotional set enhances the playability of my HP/FB collection! I can't wait to collect the new 2019 sets and recently announced HP/FB series 2 collectible minifigures to be released in 2020!
